name: Don't Die (itch) (Spartan Game Labs)
description:
Description:

A simple multiplayer game that you can play with friends. Its FFA and everyone can join/create a server. The player can choose one out of the three guns and the goal is not to die.

Download and Play Instructions:

  1. Download the zip file 
  2. Right click on the zip file and select extract or extract all and hit enter (If on Mac, it will warn you that the game doesn't recognize an identified developer. You will have to go to Mac system preferences > security and privacy > click on the bottom left lock > allow game to run)
  3. Double click the file with the unity logo (named "Multiplayer Shooter game")
  4. Start playing with your friends
